attributes.action: support the real economy by bringing forward production of the two QE class aircraft carriers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As well as providing the Royal Navy with the tools they need to perform the tasks requested of them by the government, bringing forward the production of the two new aircraft carriers would inject a strong fiscal stimulus into the real economy, support British industry and allow future savings in operational costs.

The estimated cost of £3.9billion is much smaller than the amounts already used to support the finance industry, bringing forward this spend will bring significant benefits to the real economy at a time when it is most needed.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions in exisitenc already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Royal-Navy-T45/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
